sentences.en: A lot of illnesses are stress-related.
sentences.cn: 许多疾病与压力有关。

sentences.en: all the stresses of public life
sentences.cn: 公众生活的所有压力

sentences.en: Crawford stressed the need for more housing downtown.
sentences.cn: 克劳福德强调市中心需要建更多的住宅。

sentences.en: De-stress yourself with a relaxing bath.
sentences.cn: 舒舒服服洗个澡放松一下。

sentences.en: Financial stress is well established as a chief reason for divorce.
sentences.cn: 经济压力被确认是导致离婚的首要原因。

sentences.en: It has been said that stress causes cancer.
sentences.cn: 据说压力会引发癌症。

sentences.en: Janet’s been under a lot of stress since her mother’s illness.
sentences.cn: 珍妮特自从母亲生病以来承受了很大的压力。

sentences.en: Many people felt that admitting to stress was a sign of weakness.
sentences.cn: 许多人认为承认有压力是意志薄弱的表现。

sentences.en: Massage is a wonderful antidote to stress.
sentences.cn: 按摩是舒缓压力的一剂妙方。

sentences.en: Massage is used to relax muscles, relieve stress and improve the circulation.
sentences.cn: 按摩可以使肌肉放松，缓解压力和促进血液循环。

sentences.en: Massage isn't a long-term cure for stress.
sentences.cn: 按摩对缓解压力并非长期有效。

sentences.en: One side effect of modern life is stress.
sentences.cn: 现代生活的附带产物之一就是压力。

sentences.en: Poor housing and family stress can affect both physical and mental health.
sentences.cn: 住房条件差、家庭压力大会影响身心两方面的健康。

sentences.en: She stressed the importance of a balanced diet.
sentences.cn: 她强调了均衡饮食的重要性。

sentences.en: Shoes with high heels put a great deal of stress on knees and ankles.
sentences.cn: 高跟鞋对膝盖和脚踝产生很大的压力。

sentences.en: Stress can wreak havoc on the immune system.
sentences.cn: 压力可能会破坏免疫系统。

sentences.en: Stress may act as a trigger for these illnesses.
sentences.cn: 压力可能会成为引发这些疾病的原因。

sentences.en: the misplaced stress on the first syllable of this last word.
sentences.cn: 这个最末单词的第1个音节上的重读错误。

sentences.en: The stress of war temporarily unhinged him.
sentences.cn: 战争的压力让他一时丧失了神志。

sentences.en: These exercises aim to counteract the effects of stress and tension.
sentences.cn: 这些训练旨在抵消压力与紧张的影响。

sentences.en: Under stress these people will appear to be superficial, over-eager and manipulative.
sentences.cn: 这些人在压力下会显得浅薄无知、操之过急，而且爱摆布人。

sentences.en: We worked on pronunciation, stress and intonation.
sentences.cn: 我们学习了语音、重读和语调。

sentences.en: When we are under stress our bodies tend to tense up.
sentences.cn: 人一紧张，身体就会变僵硬。

sentences.en: Your headaches are due to stress.
sentences.cn: 你的头痛是压力造成的。

words.tran_cn: 强调；使紧张；加压力于；用重音读

phrases.tran_cn: n. 动态应力，动力应力
极度受压：经历如来自于工作的极端压力
温度应力，温差应力；热应力

trans.tran_en: continuous feelings of worry about your work or personal life, that prevent you from relaxing
to emphasize a statement, fact, or idea

trans.tran_cn: 强调， 着重； 重读
trans.tran_en: to emphasize a statement, fact, or idea
